content: *this adorable wristlet is so easy and fun to make you will find yourself wanting to make more than just one it can be dressed up for a fancy dinner date or dressed down for a casual run to town the sky is the limit when it comes to embellishments and it s the perfect size for carrying your necessities add your own flair and get creative * supplies needed -150-200 yards of any yarn i recommend using lion brand rewind tape yarns or bernat home maker decrease yarn or any yarn that will make a sturdy crochet fabric like cotton -any hook size i am using a size j 6 0 mm hook -7 18 cm matching zipper my favorite brands are ykk or coats and clark -clear nylon sewing thread and regular sewing needle -stitch marker yarn needle scissors tape measure -embellishments of your choice namely something to use for a functional wristlet terminology and abbreviations used pattern is written in us terminology chain s - chain s dropped single_crochet - dsc fasten_off fo place marker - pm single_crochet single_crochet skip - skip slip_stitch - slip_stitch stitch marker - sm space s - space s stitch es - st s yarn over - yo special stitches dropped single_crochet place hook in top of single_crochet 2 rounds below below chain-1 space yo pull up a tall loop work single_crochet as usual finished measurements prior to seaming the crocheted piece should measure 7 x 7 18 x 18 cm gauge not necessary due to the simple use of stitch multiples there are youtube video links throughout the pattern for concepts that are more advanced to help you there are no refunds for the purchase of my digital patterns this pattern has been tested and edited accordingly if you see an error please let me know and i will be happy to fix it thank you
